mapper.select: select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id where ks.skill_id = #{skillID};

select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id order by ksr.left_skill_no;
mapper.insert: insert into kt_skill (skill_name, skill_detail, skill_create) value(#{skillName}, #{skillDetail}, #{skillCreate});
insert into kt_skill_relation (left_skill_no, right_skill_no, layer, skill_id, skill_level) value(#{leftSkillNo}, #{rightSkillNo}, #{layer}, #{skillID}, #{skillLevel});
mapper.update: update kt_skill_relation set left_skill_no = left_skill_no+2 where left_skill_no >= #{rightSkillNo}; update kt_skill_relation set right_skill_no = right_skill_no+2 where right_skill_no >= #{rightSkillNo};
mapper.delete: delete from kt_skill where skill_id in (select skill_id from (select skill_id from kt_skill_relation where right_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo} and right_skill_no <= #{rightSkillNo}) as tmp); delete from kt_skill_relation where skill_id in (select skill_id from (select skill_id from kt_skill_relation where right_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo} and right_skill_no <= #{rightSkillNo}) as tmp);
mapper.update: update kt_skill_relation set right_skill_no = right_skill_no-(#{rightSkillNo}-#{leftSkillNo}+1) where right_skill_no >= #{rightSkillNo}; update kt_skill_relation set left_skill_no = left_skill_no-(#{rightSkillNo}-#{leftSkillNo}+1) where left_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo};
